TextAnalysisR 0.0.2

Data-driven stopword list

Source: R/data.R
stopwords_list.Rd

Contains stopword list that was created based on inverse document frequency from SpecialEduTech

Usage

stopwords_list

Format

An object of class character of length 117.

Examples

stopwords_list
#>   [1] "ability"           "able"              "across"           
#>   [4] "activity"          "also"              "although"         
#>   [7] "among"             "analysis"          "analyzed"         
#>  [10] "approach"          "article"           "based"            
#>  [13] "can"               "child"             "class"            
#>  [16] "classroom"         "compared"          "completed"        
#>  [19] "condition"         "conducted"         "content"          
#>  [22] "control"           "current"           "data"             
#>  [25] "demonstrate"       "describe"          "design"           
#>  [28] "determine"         "disability"        "discussed"
